and world-known for its ostrich farms and the nearby Cango Caves.
There is no airport in Oudtshoorn. The nearest airports are in
The main bus companies serve Oudtshoorn on regular schedules.
It`s a scenic drive on the R62 from
over the Outeniqua pass offers some spectacular views. Worth the drive!
Up until a few years ago there was a regular train service east to
. However, these trains have been stopped and as of early February 2007 there are no scheduled passenger trains to or from Oudtshoorn.

value: content=The number one caves to visit in
. From Oudtshoorn drive to the north. You will be there after approximately 15 minutes.
content=Gaming Machines, Casino Style Pub & Grub.
content=Not to be missed. Reptiles and wild cats are bred for conservation and where it is possible you can enter the enclosures and interact with the animals.
content=The biggest and also offers ostrich rides for tourists
directions=near the campsite about 12km outside of the town in the direction of the Cango Caves
content=Oudtshoorn has some of the best quality limestome rock climbing in the world.
content=Offers a similar experience as at Highgate, but smaller.

As this is the ostrich capital, this is the place to taste everything one can get out of this species. Most of the ostrich (show) farms offer a restaurant or braai facilities.

value: content=Reveals to her guests an era of affluence and opulence. The Hotel was Built at the turn of the century by a wealthy Ostrich Baron. Lush drapes, high ceilings, ornate fireplaces and original ostrich plume showcases recreate an era of gracious elegance. Ascending the majestic staircase to the sweeping reception rooms and vast veranda, one imagines the lavish entertaining that took place in celebration of the flourishing ostrich feather industry. The hotel is ideally equipped to host weddings and other special functions.
directions=R328, 14km from Oudtshoorn en-route the Cango Caves
content=An a la carte rRestaurant, specializing in Ostrich & Venison dishes.
content=Art, travel, peace, action, sharing, magic space, highest hill in Oudtshoorn with stunning views. Style, comfort and generosity.

content=Enjoy the outdoors with us.  You could utilize the beautiful surroundings for long walks and hiking trails. Has rooms in different sizes. All 3 of the rooms are stylishly and comfortably furnished.
content=Five minutes away from the centre of town, but near the hiking trails in the area.
